email_template.subject: Bill.com Statement - {department} - {from_date} to {to_date}
email_template.body:
Dear {department} Team,

Please find attached your Bill.com accounts payable statement covering {from_date} to {to_date}.

This statement includes all bills with invoice dates within the specified period, showing vendor information, invoice details, amounts, payment status, and GL account classifications.

If you have any questions or concerns about the bills listed, please contact the Treasury team at treasurer@apache.org.

Best regards,
Apache Software Foundation Treasury
email_template.no_activity_body:
Dear {department} Team,

This is to confirm that no Bill.com activity occurred for your department during the period {from_date} to {to_date}.

If you have any questions, please contact the Treasury team at treasurer@apache.org.

Best regards,
Apache Software Foundation Treasury
